title: Lochberg
text:
The Lochberg is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Urner%20Alps">Urner Alps</a>, overlooking the <a href="G%C3%B6scheneralpsee">Göscheneralpsee</a> in the canton of <a href="Canton%20of%20Uri">Uri</a>. It lies on the chain that separates the Göschenertal from the valley called <a href="Urseren">Urseren</a>, east of the <a href="Winterstock">Winterstock</a>.
The closest locality is <a href="Realp">Realp</a> on the southern side.
